title: Beautiful 2+1, Hardwood, New Kitchen, Stainless Steel, Garage
map_address: 231 West Olive Street near Eucalyptus / Manchester
posting_body: Unit is located on the 2nd floor and has hardwood floors throughout.
Unit is very sunny, and the kitchen is brand new with new cabinets, new drawers, new quartz countertops, new vinyl, and new stainless-steel stove and fridge.
There is a dining area off of the living room, and both bedrooms have their own closets.
The bathroom is also spacious, and the unit comes with one assigned detached garage that fits one vehicle.
There are also blinds throughout, and a hallway closet for linens.
Property is only 15 units and is located in a cul-de-sac, off of Eucalyptus and Manchester.
Complex has two laundry rooms and is close to Starbuck's, restaurants, banks, gym, and easy access to freeways.
Pets are okay, but NO smoking unit.
Landlords pay for water, trash, and landscaping.
Lease is for a one-year minimum.
Please call AFTER 9 a.m. and BEFORE 9 p.m., as this is a cell phone.
